meanings.definition: The 500th anniversary of a significant event.
meanings.sent1: The quincentenaries of the town's founding were marked with a big parade.
meanings.sent2: The quincentenaries of Shakespeare's birth are celebrated worldwide.
meanings.sent3: At the quincentenaries of the library opening, they found a time capsule from 500 years ago!
meanings.sent4: The quincentenaries of the moon landing remind us of humanity's great achievements.
meanings.sent5: The quincentenaries of the ancient civilization's downfall are shrouded in mystery.

meanings.definition: A celebration or commemoration of a 500-year period.
meanings.sent1: The quincentenaries of the Renaissance era were filled with art and music.
meanings.sent2: The quincentenaries of the Middle Ages were a time of reflection on history.
meanings.sent3: The quincentenaries of the dinosaur extinction were marked with a special exhibit at the museum.
meanings.sent4: The quincentenaries of the ocean's depths hold secrets waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The quincentenaries of the ancient empire's rise to power are etched in stone.
